data.title: Joy In My Heart (I'll Fly Away Version) Lyrics

data.meta_description: Joy In My Heart (I'll Fly Away Version) Lyrics by Karen Peck & New River, Joy Gardner. Now, listen to all your favourite songs, along with the lyrics, only on JioSaavn.
data.text:
One day I was walking in a world of sin No rest for my weary soul And then I met a man who said He′d be my friend Then all my burdens He did roll God took those worldy desires Gave me heavenly fire Now I've got a brand new goal And since I met this man called Jesus Christ I′ve got the joy joy joy in my soul! Joy in my heart, Joy in my mind Joy since that happy day Joy in my hands, Joy in my feet Joy in every way God took those worldly desires Gave me heavenly fire Now I've got a brand new goal And since I met this man called Jesus Christ I've got the joy joy joy in my soul! Joy joy joy Joy joy joy Joy joy joy Joy! I got my eyes on Jesus got my mind made up I tell it everywhere I go Ain′t nobody gonna turn me around ′Cause Jesus is in control God took those worldly desires Gave me heavenly fire Now I've got a brand new goal And since i met this man called Jesus Christ I′ve got the joy in my soul! Joy in my heart, Joy in my mind Joy since that happy day Joy in my hands, Joy in my feet Joy in every way God took those worldly desires Gave me heavenly fire Now I've got a brand new goal And since i met this man called Jesus Christ I′ve got the joy joy joy in my soul! Joy joy joy Joy joy joy Joy joy joy Joy! Joy joy joy Joy joy joy Joy joy joy Joy! God took those worldly desires Gave me heavenly fire Now I got a brand new goal And since I met this man called Jesus Christ I got the joy joy joy in my soul! And since I met this man called Jesus Christ I got the joy, sweet joy, joy, sweet joy, Joy joy joy in my soul! Joy joy joy Joy joy joy Joy joy joy Joy! God took those worldly desires Gave me heavenly fire Now I got a brand new goal And since I met this man called Jesus Christ I got the joy joy joy in my soul! And since I met this man called Jesus Christ I got the joy, sweet joy, joy, sweet joy, Joy joy joy in my soul! Writer(s): Walt Mills, Tanya Goodman-sykes
